annotations.description: It was an attractive offensive game and the fans have no reason to be upset. The home side dominated today's game. The home team tried to prevail using combination football unlike the away players who attempted to beat the opposition's defence using mostly counter attacks.

We have seen an attractive offensive game so far and the fans have nothing to complain about. The hosts are enjoying a clear advantage over the opposition. The home team are playing possession football, while the away team look to find a weakness in the opposition's defence mainly with their rapid counter attacks.

annotations.description: Goal 3:0! Jese laid the ball off to Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid), who slots it into the back of the net from close range, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Wonderful movement! Cristiano Ronaldo is in a good position inside the box but decides to pass the ball to Lucas (Real Madrid), who keeps his cool and blasts the ball inside the left post. What a finish that is – 2:0.

What a poor attempt! Keko (Eibar) drives another shot towards goal this time from further out, but it couldn't have been worse if he had shot blindfolded. The ball goes into the stands.
Antonio Luna (Eibar) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) latches on to a superb cross into the box and plants a header well wide of the right post.

Lucas (Real Madrid) sends a pass into the box, but the opposition's defence is alert to the danger and makes a clearance.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: James Rodriguez (Real Madrid) struck with a perfectly taken free kick from the edge of the box. He curled the ball straight inside the left post. There are not enough superlatives that can be used to describe that goal.
